title: Hostel Management System
description: Hostel management system designed for university hostel operations.
briefDesc: This project aims to develop a Hostel Management system for a university, enabling administrators to manage student meals and food reviews using the MERN stack.
challenges: Implementing secure authentication with JWT for both students and admins.
Handling real-time updates for meal requests, likes, and reviews.
Optimizing data fetching with TanStack Query for improved performance.
Managing role-based access control for students and admins.
Implementing a Stripe-based payment system for meal subscription plans.
improvements: Enhancing the review system with an edit option
Adding real-time notifications for new meals and status updates.
Improving admin dashboard with analytics and better user management.
Introducing dark mode and UI customization for an improved user experience.
Enabling social sharing of meal reviews.

title: Service Review System
description: A platform designed to allow users to review and interact with services listed by others.
briefDesc: This system provides hands-on experience in building a full-stack application, integrating user authentication, managing CRUD operations, and handling reviews.
challenges: Handling CRUD operations efficiently, especially with MongoDB for services and reviews
Ensuring data consistency when updating or deleting services.
Implementing strong validation for login/registration, service additions, and review submissions.
Maintaining real-time updates after adding/editing/deleting services and reviews.
improvements: Implement advanced filtering based on rating, price, or category.
Notify users when they receive new reviews or replies.
